content.detailedDescription: 03/26/14 it softly rained today with intermittent stoppages.  at one stoppage at nearly 1:15 in the afternoon i saw what looked like white smoke.  it wasn���t a smoke but perhaps a type of fog.  the funny thing was that it was coming out of the ground from specific spots at the top left of our property.  at one time this area was actively volcanic but it isn���t these days.  there is no volcanic physical activity nor are there earthquakes.  i couldn���t believe how much of this fog was being emitted from this area.  i hurried to get my camera, ovilus, and to get my shoes on.  i went outside with this stuff still spewing out of the ground.  when i got closer it stopped.  i used the ovilus to see if there was a temperature change.  i held the ovilus from my hand fully extended downward toward the ground.  a change in temperature from this distance wasn���t indicated but the ovilus did say ���deep, girl, gray���. i took pictures of the area to see if the camera would pick-up any anomalies while i walked around the area.  i paced the south side starting from about the middle to my left, then back to the right, then back down again.  on my way down through a clearing i saw a sort of bell shaped object.  it looked pretty big.  to best describe what it looked like would be to say that it looked like frozen milk but it was white rather than off-white.  it was icy looking in its finish as though it was chiseled and, like frozen milk, it was opaque through semi-opaque.  it was more translucent around the edges.  i couldn���t see if was touching the ground because of the brush across its base.  if it wasn���t touching the ground it was darned close.  i turned away wanting to go to the top of the hill wanting to see if i could close in on it to get a shot but instead i turned back toward it looking to see if it was still there and it was.  i stared at it a while trying to see if it would react and tried to see if it was possible to make more observations.  i didn���t observe any sound or anything else.  i turned away rushing toward the top of the hill wanting to get a good shot.  i couldn���t see it anymore.  a car started to come up the road that would have put the car behind it.  i turned back looking all-the-while to the south on the same route that i originally saw it but i couldn���t see it any longer.  i came back to the area and took more pictures of the area wondering if an orb or anything else would show itself.  maybe someone out there can tell me if there is something in these pictures or not but the pictures i���m submitting show a blurred area in all of them.  it looks like some type of distortion.  i took some other shots that weren���t blurred but i���m not submitting those.   after i returned to the house i saw the fog start up again.  it stopped shortly afterward.  i physically shook for about 1 hour afterwards.
content.summary: Bell shaped icy white looking object

content.detailedDescription:
On march 26, 2014 at 8:54 pm, i observed a star like object moving at random to the left of the constellation sagittarius, in the southern hemisphere. i immediately recorded the ufo with my cell phone, making several recordings. i also took still photos of the object, and a video with my camcorder as well. 

upon zooming in, it was obvious that this was the same ufo that i had reported to mufon on march 5, 2014 at approximately the same time of night. it was also located in the same southern hemisphere as when i had seen it previously.

the ufo displayed various colors (pink, yellow, blue, red, green, violet)at a very rapid rate, and appeared to be a saturn shaped orb. it moved about in all directions, but never out of the area. various aircraft were observed at a lower altitude, passing by. i recorded one of these passes, with the ufo visible in the same frame.

upon inspection of a still photo taken of the ufo, it appears to show 2 tube shaped objects when zooming in. this makes the sighting even more interesting to me.

due to the cold weather at the time (32 degrees), i came inside while the object remained at the same location. it is unknown how long it remained there.
content.summary: Pulsating saturn shaped orb displaying many colors, moving randomly

content.detailedDescription: Four dull egg shaped objects moving south in a boomerang formation. was not luminescent. they were very dull/hard to see.
content.summary: Four dull egg shaped objects moving south in a boomerang formation. was not luminescent. very dull/hard to see.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright ball of fire falling rapidly from the sky, it was amazing. i dont think it was aufo but my hubbs says i should report this to you.
content.summary: Awesome close ball of fire fallin rapidly from the clear sky

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed 3 red lights flying in a line, and being followed by a big helicopter. as they came out from behind the tree they shut off all lights, and you could make out their shape. they were very dark, and the only sound i heard was the helicopter.The third one blinked red one last time, before they all went dark.
content.summary: I witnessed 3 red lights flying in a line, being followed by a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: My 2 sisters and i drove to pascagoula mississippi from bayou la batre alabama to my aunts wake it's a 30 minute drthere. the wake was from 5pm- 7pm we left around 6:30 headed back to alabama.My oldest sister was driving i was in the passengers seat my twin sister was in the back with her 3 yr son and my 3 yr daughter. we were on hwy 90 was when i noticed a bright light in the sky it seemed a little odd because it was to low to be a star and to high to be a street light but i couldn't take my eyes off of it i kept asking my sisters "what is that light" we turned on hwy 188 and the light is still outside my window. suddenly it gets so dark as if there is a power outage no street lights we only have our headlights i have never experienced darkness like that we were driving slow as we could barely see the line in the road . nets thing we knew we were headed for a field it was like we just woke up there and started yo panic we turned the car around slowly trying not to go off the narrow country road not knowing how we got here because we were not on 188 anymore. when we turned around there was disco type lights going around the car the the car cut off and there was a spot light in the middle of the road we were hysterical by this point when we cranked the car the light went away and we found our way back to 188 when we got home it was around 10:30 pm we somehow lost a couple of hours although it was odd we just passed it off because we didn't see any type of alien or actual craft just strange lights. it soon after i started waking up paralyzed and a lil scared but the beginning of last year i started having dreams of ufos that were so real to me and sometimes scared to open my eyes just laying in bed because i thought there was a alien at the foot of my bed i dreamed of 3 egg shaped objects with lots of round windows and a bright red moon and once in a dream i was with another man and he asked my name and he told me his name was mc elroy he told me not to forget his name to repeat it over and over and when i woke up i was saying his name. i also had a dream of a black craft that sorta looked like a triangle shaped navy jet or something it was also real to me it because it happened in real time and just like the other dreams it was so vivid but this one felt threatening to me as but it made my living room wall disappear and an object came out like a surveillance camera
content.summary: Lost 2 hours, was on a street we didn't turn on that ended into a field power was out everywhere and i believe i am being visited to this day

content.detailedDescription:
I took pictures of the moon from my yard recently when the moon was reported to be close to the earth.
when i reviewed the pics i noticed the shape. 
the tips of the wings look very defined.
content.summary: Taking pictures of the moon i noticed the shape.

content.detailedDescription: It's a very bright red orange object i've seen them blink there lights,  turn the red light off look just like a star and shoot up in the sky. it's hard to explain it's an event you would have to see for yourself.
content.summary: Iv been witnessing redish orange lights over my town in multiple directions on different occasions.  i belive them to be ufo's. extremely bright red orange lights that look like a ball this is a decent sized object. and have been watching them for years.

content.detailedDescription:
Foto que nos sacamos en la cima del cerro uritorco, es increible la foto que saco mi celular. por favor quisiera que la estudien y la publiquen!
no estamos solos!
content.summary: Ufo en cordoba argentina, mauro sorgi

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from church, and i heard the neighbors dogs, barking when i looked in that direction i could see about tree level, 3 yellowish orbs forming together then splitting apart, then disappear all together, when i first saw it i thought it was a yard light,
content.summary: Yellowish orbs merging together then seperating

content.detailedDescription: We were delivering newspapers in downtown littlestown,pa. on the eastern edge of town at about 4:45 am,when we came to a stop sign facing south.At this time,we observed a configuration of white lights in a diamond shape with all the lights equidistant apart.The lights were solid white and at the top and bottom there was an additional white light that pulsated together like a heartbeat.All we could see was the lights.At first,we thought it was a celltower because they were stationary.After further thought we realized celltowers have red lights,not white.We returned to the site about 5 minutes later and the lights were gone.We were really confused now.Why,if this was a celltower,did the lights go out?We returned to the site the next day after sunrise and found nothing but an empty field.No structure,no anything!!!To this day it bothers me greatly.I am a man who uses deductive reasoning to figure things out.There is no explanation for this.Whatever this was,it made no noise at all.It was approximately 400 feet from us and maybe 200 feet in altitude.I will never forget this experience ever!I remember it like it happened yesterday.It looked like this:                  .                                                                          .                                                                                                                                                 .       .                                                                                                                                                 .                                                                          .
content.summary: Delivering newspapers,saw what i thought was a celltower then when we returned to the location,it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I monitor the sun by soho and was able to record a unknown cylinder on the 28 jan 2014 on video. cylinder will be seen at the very end. i know have a update pict, 26 march 2014, but this time i was able to catch 2 cylinder.

good luck investigating.
content.summary: Cylinder on sun satelite photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was testing a new quadracopter and camera platform, just taking some random videos about 500' or more.  i did not witness it at the time of the flight.  it was not until i started going through the video that i noticed something odd.  what struck me was the speed, based on distance covered and time elapsed, which i have calculated to be around 920mph.  it moved in a straight line until i turned my camera away.  it appears to be a small orb traveling northwest from a local lake just above the tree tops.  i don't know if it's 'other-worldly' but i cannot explain it and thought that maybe you guys might have seen something similar in the past.

i am sending an edited video just to show the interesting part but i can also make the original, unedited video available.  it is well over a gigabyte so i'll wait to see if you need it.
content.summary: Really fast orb-like object travelling at tree-top level

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard with my dog around 9pm. a pretty blue light in the sky caught my attention. at first, i thought it was a blimp - we sometimes have them flying in our area, but i couldn't hear any noise. as i watched this object i noticed it started moving around in many directions and seemed to be changing colors. i figured it would fly off, but it stayed pretty much in this one area so i took a chance and ran into the house to get my phone to try and record it. it was a strange sight and i wanted to try and figure out what it was. in the video you can hear the crickets in my backyard so at the time of the sighting i did not hear a plane or engine. i recorded it for 1 minute and 42 seconds. during that time it darted around up and down left and right and changed shapes and colors. at 1:12 seconds (i looked at the time on the recording) another object came down from the upper right sky and the two objects moved around wildly together for a bit (up and down and all around) before i lost sight of them. i've never witnessed anything like this before. i'm glad my video recorded what i saw because no one would believe me if i shared this story. it was not a blimp. at the end of the recording you will hear a plane. this plane route was behind me. it did not come from the objects i was looking at. if you watch this video in slow motion you can make out a circular object with lights surrounding it - two objects once the other one falls into the frame. i took stills from the video if you would like those too.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed object out of the ordinary in my backyard. watched it for a bit and then got my phone to try and record it.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I have two occasions to share. the 1st time i witnessed a small black orb hovering very slowly through my neighborhood. it was a cloudy day and i was out for a run. the orb was lower than most of the planes i see in my neighborhood and at the same time i was running by it i saw a plane and a bird and it looked nothing like either one. nor did it fly like them. it looked in no hurry and what surprised me was how no one else seemed to notice it. i have been doing research on these things so i took it as a ufo sighting but did not feel like sharing it too much at the time. i kept up with my run and by the time i went around the block the orb had gone much higher in the sky and had seemed to be leaving the city i was in. this event took place in early february.

now what i saw yesterday made me have a rush of blood. i was peering through my window when i noticed way off into the distance a giant flying craft. it was cloudy and it seemed to be using the clouds as cover but it flew so fast i couldn't help but notice it. it was much much bigger than the commercial flights i see that fly directly over my house and this looked way further away. it was also much lower to the ground as i didn't have to look up to see it but actually straight ahead from the second story of my house. once again i was surprised no one else noticed it as this thing was massive. makes me think no one bothers looking at the sky during the day. i have heard reports of a craft the size of two football fields flying around. perhaps this was one similar to those.
content.summary: 2 occasions, 1 orb and 1 giant spacecraft

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Technically, this was told to me by two witnesses back in secondary school. 
one kid told me that he once saw a ufo ( a triangle) go over his head while he was standing on a hill. another told me he saw a red-orangish blob of light in a florida city, one of the well-known cities in that state. the first was afraid to testify because of ridicule. the second, perhaps not so much. this was during and after school and around the span of a few days between each telling. i do not know if any of these sightings were reported by other witnesses or ever reported by stated witnesses themselves to mufon or sister organizations, but i would like to state that i myself was made fun of because of my beliefs in the ufo phenomenon. i was feeling amazed that i knew someone who saw these things.
content.summary: Told to me by two witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Sky fishing and got unknown object in photo.
content.summary: Taking picture got unknown object in photo

content.detailedDescription: I'am back after a long hiatus and doing some sky fishing this time with video and caught a strange object that does not look like an insect and extremely fast, had to do a screen capture of the video. enjoy.
content.summary: Sky fishing with video and got a very fast object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my neices home in the evening and we noticed an object in the sky and because of its size immediately thought it was a plane, but a plane that may have been in distress due to how low it was flying. i would say it was probably 20 seconds ahead of us. as we got closer we realized the object was not flying, but rather hovering about 100 ft above the tree tops.  instead of turning to take them home i decided to try to catch up with it. i noticed white lights and blue lights on the tip. from what i could see i speculated it to be triangular in shape, although my neice said rectangular. as i drove to catch it, it was hovering at a slow pace but still moving. i drove for about two more blocks and crossed a busy street and by the time we got across the street it disappeared out of site. we drove through the entire neighborhood for about 10 minutes trying to find it, but it was nowhere to be found. i dropped my neices off and decided to comb the area once more, but did not see anything. we had our eyes on it and just like that it was gone from the sky. it was truly amazing and we were in awe of what just happened. unfortunately we did not get any pictures or video.
content.summary: Saw object in sky thought it was a plane at first.

1 my apartment

2 i don't remember

6 i don't remember
content.summary: I don't remember taking the pictures , but i did take them.

content.detailedDescription: This sighting happened when i get off my work going to the garage i looked up there's four lights in a triangle formation and not far from it there's a plane flying by so i know this is not an airplane.
content.summary: Ufo four lights in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: Around 1994 myself and four other friends of mine were standing outside of an appartment building. someone said look at that so we all looked up and i saw a craft hovering over the trees. i couldn't make out the shape but i could see a row of lights spinning. it reminded me of a row of christmas lights... it stayed hovering for about three minutes. it quickly took off staying right above the tree line till we saw it no more.
content.summary: A craft with christmas lights spinning around it hovered over the tree tops for three minutes then took off fast

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us guys went camping at painted canyon in mecca on 3-22-14. 
one guy went to sleep about 10 pm. two of us others were waiting for the fire to burn down before go to sleep in our tents. my name in alan, and my friend freddie happened to be sitting about 5 feet a part in chairs facing west watching the fire and the sky above. we had talked about ufo's earlier in the night, but we are skeptical, especially myself, alan. we had been talking about all the jets flying very high in the sky light at night in different directions, especially they seemed to be flying west towards lax before midnight. well approx. 10:30 pm we happened to be looking up towards the east and we both saw a bright light coming towards us over the horizon, approx. as fast as you would see a jet way up in the sky at night. however this bright white light was not as high as a high flying jet, at least in did not seem that high. it was a very powerful bright white beam of light coming closer, and ran for my camera phone. it seemed 10k to 15k high and cruised directly over our heads! my friend freddie was stunned in disbelief   and could not move to get his phone camera. i barely got my galaxy note ii phone camera, switched it to video, and boom there here is! however the round globe was cruising very smoothly, slowly, noiseless, smokeless, and straight. i was freaked out and was staring at it, not taking the best video footage, but at least i got it. i am upset i did not video it 100% all the way, but we were almost a sleep and i ran for my camera phone in my tent, and at least i got this video. we both agreed it was white, then glowed orange, then back to white and maybe small to big and small to big, then back to orange and bigger. towards the end of the video, it seemed to have slightly change directions a only a few degrees, turn white, get smaller and go up out of sight, or disintegrate. this had no blinking lights, no noise, no trail of gas or smoke, not an airplane or balloon, not a meteorite, and low flying! perhaps it was right outside the earths atmosphere, where there is no gravity, and this was perfect round glowing ball on lava floating? it travel from west to east, right over our heads, in painted canyon road, mecca, ca, on the north side of the salton sea, ca. it appeared to be slightly cruising at 200 mph or so. it is possible is was much higher than jumbo jets, but we both agreed it was not that high, and definitely not something garage made sphere or military made orange ball. if it was a slow moving glowing orange rock, well it almost hit earth near the salton sea. it was truly a ufo! a giant round orange sphere silently flying at night! it never did make any sound at all. we have both never seen anything like it before, and may never again in our life time again!
regards, alan
content.summary: Started as white bright round light, then glowed orange, went small then big, 200 mph?

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside to run to store. looked up and noticed a bright "planet" above the treeline across the street...Pretty much directly north. it was around 9:00pm to 9:30pm. at first glance it was rather "normal". it was a clear night and the stars and a few planets were visible (jupiter and mars). 
in fact, i could see a few high altitude aircraft passing over as is the norm. (i look up at the sky on a regular basis when i leave the house. i like to try and spot satellites as they pass over) 
but something was amiss here...This object didn't twinkle like a star (why i labeled it as a "planet"). and...I had never noticed such an extremely bright object in this location. 
it appeared to be in between the brightness of jupiter and mars. neither of which would be located at this position. the color was off for either too. it wasn't as reddish as mars and yet not as light as jupiter... more of a yellow/orange in color. i really had to pause for a moment....I could look up and see jupiter. i could look over and see mars close to the horizon....?
while, i'm not completely sure of the constellations and their positions i did note that this object was perhaps a "fist-width" distance from a star to its right and it was stationary...It did not move. 
i observed this light for aprox 5 min. i walked back under the carport...Came back. walked over into my neighbors yard trying to determine if this was perhaps something at tree-top level. it's placement in relation to the star remained the same. the next thing perplexed me more. it faded. it faded down to that little pinpoint of light just like a satellite would as it gets closer to the horizon and sinks below the sunshine at that altitude.  it was like someone had turned off the power and all that remained was the residual glow of the filament in a bulb. this sort of freaked me. there was light splotchy haze moving across the sky. the "dimming" i saw would be consistent with a bright light source being masked/blocked with in moving haze/clouds. but....No! i could not detect any "cloud" in that spot...And the star that was to it's right..The one i used to to determine whether it moved or not, never dulled or was blocked by haze/clouds. 
i got in my car and went to the store. came back, thinking perhaps this light would reappear or still be there.... nope. i have never seen a "ufo" that i know of either as a child or an adult. but this, whatever it was, was not normal....Or perhaps average. it was certainly new to me. i have been pondering this for days. perhaps a secret launch from va? i don't know. but i do know this: if this was a rocket booster pushing some satellite up into orbit it's flight path had to be identical or extremely close along my line of sight compared to that star. there was no indication of a distance change between the object and that star or other indication of motion...Pulsing, fluctuation or color change. nothing till that smooth sudden fade....
i hesitated to report this for a few days. still trying to find the name of the stars and constellations at that location in the sky. i did notice that there was a report...Very similar...In tenn 2 days later. any ideas? please let me know something...
content.summary: Came outside to run to store. looked up and noticed a bright planet above the treeline just across the street.

content.detailedDescription: Drivng home from milford pa. to be home in westfall township i observed at approximately 2100pm 4 orange/red disks information and hovering above high point monument in nj. 3 of them were about 1/4 mile apart in a straight horizontal line the 4th one was about 1/2 mile from the others but was on a different angle like at perhaps a 70 degree angle to the other 3. 3 of them were about 1000 ft in altitude the 4th on the right was substantially higher perhaps 2000ft. appearance of the orbs suggest a flat appearance, the color never changed. no port/starboard collision warning lights. the just remained hovered then in a flash gone. weather conditions were clear, no reflections of tail lights, no atmospheric anomalies as near as i can tell. i check my dashboard and traffic to determine if it was a possible reflection and was in the process of pulling over to take a picture with my phone. they were gone in the time it took to pull over. no other anomalies were observed or detected at that time. the event was about 4 mins when first observed to when i tried to pull over.
content.summary: 4 orange/red orbs observed above high point monument in hight point park.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking out to my barn to feed my horses,and gazed at the sky noticing that it was a very clear night and the stars were brilliant and twinkling as they usually are on cold clear nights. happened to see a very bright orange "star" about 15 degrees directly below the north star.(polaris) i didn't pay too much attention to it until i was returning to the house and noticed that it was brighter that the planet venus but more orange in color. i stopped and watched it for about 10 minutes and it dawned on me that i had never seen or noticed such a star in that location and i knew that no planets track that far north in the sky. after going back inside, i mentioned it to my wife and we looked out the window and it was still there. about 10
minutes later,i received a phone call from a friend who lives about 40 miles east of me and i told him about it, and asked if he could see it. he went outside and confirmed that he also saw it. i asked him if he had a sky map app on his smartphone and he did. he pointed the sky map at it and no identified stars showed up on the app. while we were talking, i decided to get my camcorder and film it, but i was too late. he, all of a sudden said that the darn thing just disappeared. it blinked out. i immediately walked back outside and sure enough it was gone.
content.summary: Bright orange starlike orb, stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to lock my shop and was in my driveway looking east at the skyline it was dark except for normal valley lights and such and  as i turned to my right heading to the shop i saw a flash or reflection of light in the sky to my left and turned to look and i was amazed to watch "something" moving my way. i could tell something was there but could not grasp it! it then was closer on my left side and then i could see what is very difficult to explain. it had no lighting at all, total blackness. they were triangles connected and stacked so they would fit in the area, like a window. it was level and not very high. how high is for someone else to say but i can approximate the distance above my neighbors home. it continued on west and at about the same distance to my right that i first saw it on my left, the "window" was not visible, but the same strange motion and "stuff" was there. then it was gone or no longer visible to me. i can not even guess at it's speed but someone may know more if i showed them how i turned my head and the points it became visible and was not.
my feeling now is i witnessed something in the sky but i am sure no one else has ever seen anything like it. my reactions are varied, it could have been a stealth air craft and i saw it because the lighting was shinning just right but it was soundless, nothing at all and that's what was even more freaky. because it was so difficult to see it makes it hard to judge it's size and how close it was to me. i will always remember it and hope you don't think i nuts. thanks for letting me talk about it.
content.summary: Saw reflective light and watched object travel east to west with out any sound.It was almost invisable but not .Visable side looked like triangles stacked in both directions. it made my eyes feel blured.

content.detailedDescription: in bus me looking out window and i see a ufo
content.summary: In bus me looking out window and i see a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Well, this is really two stories.  my husband saw the first half and i saw the second half of the strange sighting.

husband went outside to the balcony and was talking on the phone.  looked up at the stars and noticed that one of the stars on the big dipper moved to the center of the big dipper, then zipped backed and forth, then went back to the center and started to flash.  then it shot straight down.  then he noticed out of the corner of his eye a flash and thought it might be fireworks.  he started to watch these strange cloud like flashes and they were shaped liked a rainbow or dome.  they were green and white but mostly green.  then he came back in the house and continued with his phone conversation.  he first noticed this event around 10:00 p.M.

i went outside to the balcony around 11:15 not even know that my husband saw this and then noticed a flashing from the corner of my eye.  i was sitting down getting ready to make a phone call and i saw the flashing again.  my first thought was - is there lightening out tonight but there was not a cloud in the sky and it was a clear bright night.  then i saw the flash again and started to watch it.  first i thought, is that a firework and just stood there because i realized that it was not.  i saw orange flashing and white but mostly orange and at first it was shaped like a rainbow or dome - then it just became orange flashes of clouds and then a little white flashing and this frequent.  

there was one this one orange cloud like flash that i noticed with some kind of oval shaped object.  it was going down and it looked large from a distance.  i was just starring at it watching it and i thought i saw red colored lights or it could have been a reflection from the orange flash.  it did not look like it was part of the orange cloud that was flashing.  i know i saw something.  i was waiting for it to come back up so i could get a second look but it never came back up.  when this object was coming down, it was not like a drop or quick movement. 

well, i went back in the house to tell my husband what i saw and that is when he told me what he saw.  

i was watching this for hours and it seemed to be flashing less as time went on and then i noticed that it was flashing only white until about 2:00 am. then i went back out at 3:00 and it completely stopped. some of the lights i saw in that direction gone and just total complete darkness  like normal.

i have to say that i could have sworn i saw other unexplained things - it seemed very active out there.

i can't imagine that we were the only one to witness this.
content.summary: Noticed a star flashing then zig zagged & shot straight down.  then noticed green & white flashing in the sky - cloud like and it was shaped like a rainbow or dome.  then orange and white flashing in the sky.  with the orange sometimes dome shaped

content.detailedDescription:
I live in san francisco, ca.  in the haight-ashbury district.

initially, i wasn't going to report this event.  my life is peppered by an ongoing series of unusual experiences - of which this was only one.  but recently, i began learning of possible connections between human consciousness/telepathy and ufos (thank you, grant cameron.).  so, here it is...  (please note: i'm approximating the date and time.  as i said, i hadn't planned on reporting it.)

at around 12:30 am, in september 2013, i was sitting on my front steps reading (a favorite past-time).  the expansive sky was dark, but completely clear.  i'd scanned it, but saw only the same stars that i usually see - where i usually see them.  there was the occasional car or pedestrian passing by, but overall it was quiet.

i was reading my book, intently.  my reading was interrupted by the sudden appearance of a huge, blossoming, blue-white flash in the north-eastern sky.  i immediately scanned that area of the sky, but there was nothing unusual to be seen.  nothing was out of place.  nothing was added.  no movement.  no shadows.  nothing.

but that flash... it'd come from, well, nothing.  just the vast darkness.  then, from a microscopic spark... it exploded... blossoming/expanding simultaneously in all directions... to such a size and such a blazing, brilliant, brightness that... it had to be - something.

i know that it wasn't a camera flash.  i know that it wasn't lights on a plane/drone/rc anything.  it wasn't a helicopter.  it wasn't a paper lantern.  it wasn't the planet venus or mars or any other.  it wasn't a shooting star.

it felt, to me, like it was extremely faraway, but also focused.  it was intentional.  i don't know...  perhaps it was a signal to... someone?

everything had been and still was quiet.  i sat there, slack-jawed in my awed silence.   in my head, i kept asking myself, "what the heck was that?!".  i'd never seen anything like it before - or since.

then, just for fun, i looked towards the point in the sky where i'd seen the flash originate and i said - aloud - to the seemingly, blank night sky, "i saw you.  i saw that.  do it again.  please.".  and, in the very next instant, when i was about to return my attention to the book in my lap - it exploded into existence, again.  i watched as a second huge, brilliant, blossoming, blue-white flash began... grew... spread out across a vast (in the amount of dark, distant sky it seemed to erupt from) area, in nanoseconds.  and then, just as quickly, it was gone.

i desperately scanned the sky for something... anything that could have caused the flashes.  but, there was nothing.  no planes.  no helos.  no lanterns.  no drones.  no planets, comets, meteorites.  no movement.  no lights.  no shadows.  nothing.

i was glad that i'd seen the first flash.  and, i was elated that whatever had created the original flash, had "done it again" in the very same spot - seemingly upon request.  and, i was also a little disconcerted, to be honest.

but, even if my experience was related to consciousness/communication and/or ufos... telepathy, itself, is far from a new concept to me.  i just hadn't considered the possibilities... the distances it could traverse... instantaneously.

thank you for reading my account.
content.summary: Traffic-free night sky. saw huge, sharp, expansive blue-white flash.  searched for source.  nothing.  intrigued.  said, "i saw that. do it again."  it did, instantaneously.
